name: Caviar Mousse
keywords: appetizer, black caviar, butter, eggs, melba toast, onion, sour cream

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the eggs with the butter in food processor, or mash to blend thoroughly. Spread the egg-butter mixture in a small serving bowl.
Mix onion with sour cream and spoon over egg mixture. Refrigerate overnight.
To serve, top with caviar and pass with Melba toast.
